verses.name: John 4:10
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.

verses.name: John 4:11
verses.text: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?

verses.name: John 4:12
verses.text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?

verses.name: John 4:13
verses.text: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:
